SA14kamvchtu:384: yenānubhūyate tenaiva smaryate pratyabhijñāyate veti prasiddham /
SA14kamvchtu:386: prayogaḥ- yau bandhamokṣau tāvekādhikaraṇakau, yathā- devadattasyaiva śṛṅkhalābandhanaṃ mokṣaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:389: tatra yadi svatantrasyaikasya paramārthasato nityasya puruṣasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:390: tadā tathāvidhena puruṣeṇa saha kvāpi hetoḥ sambandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:398: yadā yatra santāne 'vidyādikaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:400: sa eva punaḥ śrutamayādikrameṇāryamārgotpādād avidyādinirodhenāśrayaparāvṛttau muktaḥ ityupacaryate /
SA14kamvchtu:401: ubhāvapi tau bandhamokṣau nityaikaparamārthavastuviṣayakau natarāṃ siddhau /
SA14kamvchtu:403: yasmin santāne śubhoo vā aśubho vā cittānubhavaḥ samutpadyate,
SA14kamvchtu:404: tasminneva kālāntare santatiparipākamāgamya mastuluṅgalākṣādirasāvasiktasantatiparipāka iva sukha-duḥkha-smṛtyādiphalodayo dṛṣṭāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:406: naiva khalu kaścidekaḥ kartā bhoktā smartā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:408: na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, niyatasāmarthyavato bījāderiva kāraṇaśakteḥ pratiniyatatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:409: tataśca yeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratiniyataḥ teṣu naiva kaścid eko 'nugataḥ bhinnāvasthaśca paridṛśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:415: anyathā tayorubhayorapyavasthayoranupapannatve parasparokārakatvābhāve vā ākāśamiva kathaṃ tāvat tāvat sidhyet bhoktrādiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:417: itthaṃ pratiniyatātmanā sambandhena sukhādīnāṃ sambhavaḥ na tu sarvatra /
SA14kamvchtu:422: tathāpi pratyaviṣayatvād ahaṃbuddheḥ pratyakṣata evātmā sidhyatīti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:423: tadapi tāvanna yujyate, bhrāntatvāt savikalpatvād asiddhatvācca pratyakṣeṇa tatrāhaṃbuddheriti /
SA14kamvchtu:424: ahaṃbuddhau pratīyamānatve yathā khalu pratyakṣa eko nityo vibhuścātmā svasiddhāntairukalpyate tathā naivopalabhyata ityavaśyameva draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:425: anyathā ahaṃbuddheryadi pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt tadā vivādamāneṣu tāvannaiva pravarteta ātmaviṣaye kaścana vivādaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:429: anādikālābhyāsavaśāt pratinīyateṣu rūpādiskandheṣu ekatvamadhyāropya paraṃ vyāvarttīyatumahamiti pratītiḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:431: kāye cāyamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama deha iti bhedamātragrahaṇamiti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:433: yadi cātmani ayamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama ātmā iti cintyate /
SA14kamvchtu:434: atha vastuto 'bhinne 'pi bhedāntaraparihāreṇa tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ śilāputrakasya śarīravad bhedopacāreṇa grahaṇānnāsti virodha iti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:436: ātmā khalu viṣayaḥ punaḥ kramotpattyā virudhyata iti paścāt vakṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:437: na kevalamātmagraha ātmā apitu tadviṣayo rūpādirātmāstītyapi vaktuṃ na śakyate,
SA14kamvchtu:439: krameṇopalabhyamānatvānna te ekasvabhāvāḥ, na ca svatantrāḥ / ata evoktam-
SA14kamvchtu:444: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam /
SA14kamvchtu:446: bādhakapramāṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate- yadyevamātmā skandhebhyo 'bhinnastadā skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:449: ataḥ skandheṣveva ātmeti prajñapyate, na tāvannāmni vivādaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:450: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādināsambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam /
SA14kamvchtu:451: tatra prayogaḥ- yo nāsti sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:454: ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:456: tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam /
SA14kamvchtu:458: tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:459: sukhādīnāmamūrtatvānna sambhavati (teṣām) adhogamanamiti kathamiva ātmana ādhāratvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:460: sthityāpi nādhāraḥ, sthiteḥ sthāturabhinnatvāt, tasyaiva kārakatvamiti? tadapi tāvanniṣidhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:461: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:465: anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam /
SA14kamvchtu:466: avipariṇāmātmani tāvat sthāpakena kiṃ kriyate, sthīrātmanā svabhāvena svayamavasthitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:468: ata evākiñcitkaratvena saṃyogasambandho 'pi tāvannaiva yujyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:470: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:473: saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:476: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā /
SA14kamvchtu:477: adarśane 'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
SA14kamvchtu:479_0: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati
SA14kamvchtu:479_1: kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:482: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ, aviśiṣṭatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:485: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:488: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:489: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā?
SA14kamvchtu:490: atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā?
SA14kamvchtu:492: [Vajraṭ_120] sukhādibhirākāśavannirvikāratvena naiva khalu yujyate bhoktṛtvam, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:494: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:498: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvastāvadanityeṣveva sambhavati, na khalu nityeṣu /
SA14kamvchtu:499: teṣu nāsti kasyacidapi kāryasya krameṇotpādasāmarthyam, yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA14kamvchtu:506: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti /
SA14kamvchtu:511: iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:512: tathāpi arthakriyārthino hi prekṣāvantaḥ [Vajraṭ_121] tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:517: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran, sarvasaṃskṛtānāṃ skandhasaṃgṛhītatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:518: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo 'yamuktapūrva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:520: ataḥ 'sarve dharmā nirātmānaḥ'; iti bhagavataḥ siṃhanādaḥ samastatairthikakuñjaravṛndānāṃ bhīkaraḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:523: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:526: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram /
SA14kamvchtu:532: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet /
SA14kamvchtu:535: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:536: na vastupratiṣṭhitena ityādinātra yogasamāpattyā [Vajraṭ_122] kathaṃ pratipattavyamityāveditam /
SA14kamvchtu:537: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:538: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:544: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:546: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:547: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:553: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:555: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:556: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:558: vyāvṛttibhedenāṃśopacāre 'pi vastvādisārupyadharmāṇāṃ sarvatra [Vajraṭ_123] vidyamānatvāt sarveṇa sarvamavagamyeta /
SA14kamvchtu:559: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:560: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:568: svākārādhānena tāvadutpādako heturnaiva niyamena sidhyati, vyabhicārāt /
SA14kamvchtu:570: na ca saṃhitāḥ, tebhyo 'narthāntaratvāt vikalpaviṣayāṇām asattvācca /
SA14kamvchtu:573: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:575: bhāvamātreṇa vedane sati sarvaiḥ sarvavedanaprasaṅgaḥ, aviśiṣṭatvāt sarvasya /
SA14kamvchtu:576: ato nīlasaṃvedanamidam, na pītamiti vyavasthā na syāt, vyavasthāyāḥ kasyāpi hetuviśeṣasyābhāvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:577: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:578: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:580: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
SA14kamvchtu:581: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati, nānumānādapi /
SA14kamvchtu:582: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:585: itarat pramāṇaṃ nāsti, ato tāvannaiva sidhyati bāhyo 'rthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:586: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:591: na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:594: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:602: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti, astyeva ca bādhakam /
SA14kamvchtu:603: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam, gaganāravindavat /
SA14kamvchtu:608: evaṃ tāvad rūpādyāyatanānāṃ bāhyavastūnāṃ naikatvam, āvṛtyanāvṛtyorviruddharmayostatropalabdhe /
SA14kamvchtu:612: tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
SA14kamvchtu:614: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran /
SA14kamvchtu:622: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:624: atha syāt- vijñānaṃ tvekameva, mithyākārāṇāṃ tatrāvabhāsyamānatvānna nānātvadoṣa iti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:625: sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:627: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti /
SA14kamvchtu:628: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:631: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
SA14kamvchtu:637: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti /
SA14kamvchtu:642: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā / tathā coktam-
SA14kamvchtu:648: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam /
SA14kamvchtu:652: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet /
SA14kamvchtu:653: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA14kamvchtu:656: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra /
SA14kamvchtu:657: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:658: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
SA14kamvchtu:662: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:663: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:667: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte, yathā ityādyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:668: nimittaṃ tu vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ vānutpādādi, tasyodgrahaṇaṃ saṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:670: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:671: athavā samagreṇaitena gāmbhīryamasya vyapadiṣṭam, adhyāropāvādāntau pratiṣiddhau ceti /
SA14kamvchtu:678: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate, (dvitīyapakṣe tāvat)
SA14kamvchtu:679: bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ, so 'pi vyarthaḥ syāt sattvābhāvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:682: bhagavatā deyādivastūnāṃ dṛṣṭatvāt, na ca viṣayasyāpyabhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:683: anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatārthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:684: iti pṛcchāyāṃ yaḥ subhūte, bodhisattvaḥ ityādinā visarjitam /
SA14kamvchtu:685: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:694: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti, nānyeṣu /
SA14kamvchtu:695: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate, saṃvṛtisattvābhyupagamāt /
SA14kamvchtu:699: tadā dānādiṣu pravṛttirnābhyupeyate prayogāvasthāyāṃ [Vajraṭ_129] vyutthitāvasthāyāṃ vā kriyayopālambho na yujyate /

SA14kamvchtu:709_1: dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā
SA14kamvchtu:711: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:712: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
SA14kamvchtu:717: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:718: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti?
SA14kamvchtu:719: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣa, paramāṇūnāṃ pūrvameva nirastatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:724: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:725: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:737: alakṣaṇaṃ tāvat paramārthe draṣṭavyam, kasyāpi lakṣaṇasyāsiddhatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:746: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye 'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:747: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:748: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
SA14kamvchtu:754: sūtrāntapadeṣu iti sūtrāntadeśanāvācaḥ, tābhirarthasya pratipādyamānatvāt jñāpyamānatvācca /
SA14kamvchtu:757: asmin kathane 'evam'; ityanena tāvad gambhīraudārye yojanīye /
SA14kamvchtu:760: arthato 'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram 'ayaṃ bhūtaḥ'; iti saṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:763: pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:768: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān /
SA14kamvchtu:769: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo 'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:770: śīlaprajñayośca pṛthaguktatvād guṇastāvadatra dhyānajo grāhyaḥ, gobalīvardanyāyeneti /
SA14kamvchtu:771: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:774: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:775: teṣāṃ tato 'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:781: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:782: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:784: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:785: prasaviṣyanti iti puṇyotpādakālaḥ, pratigrahīṣyanti iti nirodhakāle tadvāsanāḥ parigrahīṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:786: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:788: te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe 'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:789: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam, gambhīratā cāpyabhihitā /
SA14kamvchtu:794: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā?
SA14kamvchtu:798: atha kim ucchedavādināmiva abhāvasaṃjñā? iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:799: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
SA14kamvchtu:801: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta, dharmāgrahaṇe tadabhāvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:803: tadyathā satye 'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:805: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam';
SA14kamvchtu:806: ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñāpi ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:807: nāmnastāvad rūpaskandhāntarbhūtatvād rūpādivad mithyātvameva, viprayuktamapi prajñaptimātramiti /
SA14kamvchtu:809: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino 'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi..... nāaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:810: yena te yogino bhavanti, tacca yogijñānaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:811: vyutthāne śuddhalaukikajñānamudbhavatīti, anyathā ahetukameva tad bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:812: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet? tenaiva hetunā /
SA14kamvchtu:813: yathā pratyātmavedyatayā pudgalanairātmāvabodhena ātmasthitaṃ pudgalanairātmyamadhigamyate, atrāpi tattulyam /
SA14kamvchtu:819: niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:822: sāmānyena tatra tadātmabhāvo 'pi saṃgṛhyate, na tatra pṛthak tadālambakatvam /
SA14kamvchtu:823: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:825: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:826: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:827: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na pravartate?
SA14kamvchtu:828: naivam, yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā, (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:829: ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:831: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
SA14kamvchtu:833: yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
SA14kamvchtu:835: dharmanimittagrāhakamanasikārasya [Vajraṭ_136] tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:836: ata eva ekameva yānam, tacca mahāyānamityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:838: bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:840: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:842: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:844: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate?
SA14kamvchtu:850: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:851: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:852: yato hi sarvo dharmo 'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
SA14kamvchtu:853: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā)
SA14kamvchtu:854: pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati, kimu (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:857: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ [Vajraṭ_137] syāditi,
SA14kamvchtu:861: "bhadanta subhūte kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyajānadbhirdharmā eva prahātavyāḥ, prāgevādharmā iti /
SA14kamvchtu:862: yo hi dharmaḥ prahīyate, so 'pi nādharmaḥ iti /"
SA14kamvchtu:867: tena prasiddhaviruddhāḥ adharmalakṣaṇāḥ paraparikalpitā ātmādayaśca upadiṣṭāste 'pi saṃgṛhyante /
SA14kamvchtu:869: anena tāvad vikṣepaṃ nīgṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:872: tadā abhisambuddho bhūtvā 'bhagavatā sarve dharmā deśitāḥ'; iti tadapi mṛṣaiva syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:873: ata eva bodhisattvaiḥ tathāgatajñānahetumadhigamadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chando na janayitavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:874: ityetad vicārya jñānahetudharmakāyāvāptaye chandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityaktam /
SA14kamvchtu:875: anenārthataḥ paramārthastu anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti abhisambuddha ityetayoḥ [Vajraṭ_138] grahaṇamapi vipakṣatayā paridīpitam,
SA14kamvchtu:876: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:877: anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhādīnāṃ pratipattibhedena bhinnaḥ jñānahetuko 'dhigamakāyastāvannirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:878: śrāvakādīnāmapi guṇā bodhisattvenāvagantavyā eva, anyathā kathaṃ tāvat sarvajñapadalābhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:879: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:881: taduktābhiprāyaṃ saṃgṛhya āryasubhūtisthaviraḥ yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi ityetadavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:883: kasmānnābhisambuddhaḥ, dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:884: agrāhyaḥ iti paramārthastāvannirvikalpajñānagocaro 'pi na bhavatīti uktapūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:887: imau dvau (śabdau) abhisambuddhābhāvasya dharmadeśanābhāvasya ca yathākramaṃ hetutayābhihitau /
SA14kamvchtu:888: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:889: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:890: sarvabhāvānāṃ paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parinirvṛttatvānna sambhavati svalakṣaṇadhārakatvam /
SA14kamvchtu:891: yadyevaṃ tarhi bhagavatā abhāvo 'bhisambuddho draṣṭavya iti vicārya nādharmaḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:892: sa tu prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvaḥ anena tāvat yogasamāpattiṃ nirdiśya adhyāropo 'pavādāntaśca nirastau /
SA14kamvchtu:893: tatkasya hetoḥ? ityupapattiḥ pṛcchyate, tadarthaṃ asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitāḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:899: 'yo ānanda, dharmo 'nutpannaḥ, aniruddhaḥ, asthitaḥ avikṛtastaducyate āryasatyamiti'; /
SA14kamvchtu:901: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:908: anyeṣu tattvasadbhāvo naiva tāvad yujyate, tacca (tattvaṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:912: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate /
SA14kamvchtu:913: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; iti /
SA14kamvchtu:915: tattu (tattvaṃ) paramārthato nāsti bhāvasvabhāvaḥ, asiddhaiva bhāvasvabhāvatā kasyāpi /
SA14kamvchtu:917: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat /
SA14kamvchtu:920: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:921: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca /
SA14kamvchtu:926: yadi bhagavato 'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:927_0: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe 'nupravartitavyamiti
SA14kamvchtu:927_1: vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:932: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ, tadahetoḥ sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:939: anutpannāḥ, kathaṃ tato nidāna puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
SA14kamvchtu:943: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:945: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva /
SA14kamvchtu:946: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:947: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate /
SA14kamvchtu:951: yadyevaṃ na syāt, paramārthataḥ sa puṇyaskandho bhavet (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:953: abhāṣitamityevaṃ vacanaṃ nirarthakamiti cet? yato bhāṣitāstasmāt saṃvṛtāvevetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:957: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:958: anena tathāgatānāṃ [Vajraṭ_142] puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā)
SA14kamvchtu:960: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:962: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:965: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve 'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā /
SA14kamvchtu:966: gāthā iti yatra na yatio, 'pāda'; śabdena catuḥpādaṃ gāthāparimāṇaṃ parigṛhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:974: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito 'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:975: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:977: evaṃ [Vajraṭ_143] bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
SA14kamvchtu:979: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati /
SA14kamvchtu:980: prajñāparigṛhītatve sati dānādīnāṃ mahābodhiphalamadhigamyate, na tu prādeśikānām /
SA14kamvchtu:981: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam?
SA14kamvchtu:982: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:983: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo 'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate, na tu ratnaiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:984: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:987: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti /
SA14kamvchtu:988: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti [Vajraṭ_144] vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:989: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:990: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti?
SA14kamvchtu:991: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto?
SA14kamvchtu:993: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:995: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:997: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:999: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1002: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno 'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1004: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced?
SA14kamvchtu:1005: tathā sati rūpakāyo 'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:1008: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
SA14kamvchtu:1010: nāstyasyāyaṃ vipākabhedaḥ, na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanāpi /
SA14kamvchtu:1011: kimiva tarhīti cet? vastumātraṃ dharma iti deśanā /
SA14kamvchtu:1013: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ, ajñāpakatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1014: prajñaptita ityucyamāne 'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:1016: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1021: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno 'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena /
SA14kamvchtu:1022: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1024: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni /
SA14kamvchtu:1040: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite 'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:1042: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle 'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo 'bhavam,
SA14kamvchtu:1043: '; yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1045: sattvasaṃjñādivirahasya naivamabhiprāya iti vighnabhūtābhimānavisaṃyogārthaṃ pañcamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:1046: asyāyamatra sāmānyato 'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1047: teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:1049: tasmin kāle 'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ vā,
SA14kamvchtu:1052: tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum /
SA14kamvchtu:1057: tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1061: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1062: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā prāptam ityanena apalakṣaṇamātrapradarśanena sarveṣāmabhimānānāṃ praheyatvaṃ pradarśaye /
SA14kamvchtu:1064: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato 'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ) āpannaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1074: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1075: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1077: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1078: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:1087: na syāt prāpyaprāpakabhāve samakālatvamātramapi teṣām, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1088: na cāpyekasya hetutvam, ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt, idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī /
SA14kamvchtu:1089: ye tāvanmūrtāḥ, teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate, ekadeśena (saṃyoge tu)
SA14kamvchtu:1091: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne 'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1098: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante /
SA14kamvchtu:1101: nāpannaḥ, mayā prāptamityapi na manyate, tasmāt sanmārgasthitatvāt srotaāpanna ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1103: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1107: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1108: evaṃ hi 'mayā iti yo 'yamabhiniveśaḥ, sa ātmadṛṣṭisamudayaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1111: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1118: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhannāma prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:1119: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1122: padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi';
SA14kamvchtu:1125: atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1126: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1130: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
SA14kamvchtu:1132: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1133: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo 'sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1135: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1136: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena, atha kathamiti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:1139: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1140: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1142_1: teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid
SA14kamvchtu:1142_2: dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1143: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1144: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma, yathoktaṃ pūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:1146: [Vajraṭ_152] tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
SA14kamvchtu:1148: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1154: ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau /
SA14kamvchtu:1157_0: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ
SA14kamvchtu:1160: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1163: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho 'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
SA14kamvchtu:1164: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1167: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1169: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam'; ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1171: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1173: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [na karttavyamityapi] nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1174: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete /
SA14kamvchtu:1175: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1178: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve 'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1181: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1185: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāpṛṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1186: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1188: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena, na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1192: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1193: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1194: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:1197: tato 'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo 'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:1198: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet?
SA14kamvchtu:1199: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1201: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite /
SA14kamvchtu:1202: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1204: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1205: [Vajraṭ_155] anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1209: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1210: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1211: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1212: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1213: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitam- vastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:1215: - [Vajraṭ_156] tatraudāryaṃ tu vastubhedasaṃbāhulyam, yadāha tāvato lokadhātūn iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1216: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1220: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1222: tatra arhadbhyaḥ ityanena prahāṇasampad darśitā, hatakleśāritvād niruktyā 'arhan'; ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1227: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam /
SA14kamvchtu:1228: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1236: yadaivaṃ pudgalanairātmyagāthāmātropadeśenāpi caityabhūtyabhūto jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1239: vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam paryavāpsyanti iti artham /
SA14kamvchtu:1242: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1244: kvacid dhārayiṣyanti ityekameva padam, tatra dhāraṇaṃ tu padārthayordraṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1248: sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1249: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1251: tacca ye kecana gurusadṛśāḥ (teṣāṃ) sarveṣāṃ paryāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1255: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite /
SA14kamvchtu:1256: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1257: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:1258: - [Vajraṭ_158] kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1259: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1260: iyaṃ prajñāpi, pāramadhigamya paricchedayatītyapi pāramiteti, prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1261: athavā prajñāyāḥ pāraṃ prajñāpāram, anayā tadadhigamya paricchidyate 'tastathocyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1262: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1264: sā ca yathoktā prajñaiva, na tvanyat tatpāragamanāsambhavāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1267: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ? itio pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:1268: yaiva subhūte, prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā sā ityudatarat /
SA14kamvchtu:1269: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
SA14kamvchtu:1271: sa vikalpo 'pi prakṛtyā bhrāntaḥ, atastena samāropita ākāro 'pi mithyaiva /
SA14kamvchtu:1272: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1277: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1278: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1280: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1282: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1283: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1284: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1285: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1290: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ 'nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1291: iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1292: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1293: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1297: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1299: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1301: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1304: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti /
SA14kamvchtu:1307: te ca paramāṇavo 'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ, (tarhiṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:1308: kathaṃ tad bahu rajaḥ? iti pravādināmāśayamabhilakṣya kasya [Vajraṭ_161] hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:1310: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo 'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva /
SA14kamvchtu:1312: idaṃ tāvadekatvagrahaṇopāyamātram, na tu paramārtham, tenocyate pṛthivīraja iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1314: anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1315: udbhāvanāsaṃvṛtyāpi tasya deśanaṃ na yujyate, tadīyānyatarātmasvabhāvasya apratibhāsamānatvāt /

SA14kamvchtu:1319: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo 'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha /

SA14kamvchtu:1322: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,

SA14kamvchtu:1329: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1330: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1333: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye 'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:1335: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:1344: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:1349_0: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe 'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ
SA14kamvchtu:1352: anena cāsāre 'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
SA14kamvchtu:1356: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1360: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1361: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1366: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1368: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1371: bhūtasaṃjñām ityaviparītārthasaṃjñām, na tu śabdābhiniveśenedaṃ bhūtatvamiti saṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:1378: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:1379: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1381: saṃjñānāma na kācana, ekānekasvabhāvena viyogāt, paramārthataḥ sā asaṃjñaiva /

SA14kamvchtu:1383: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
SA14kamvchtu:1386: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
SA14kamvchtu:1392: sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime [Vajraṭ_165] samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1397: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ- anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1399: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle 'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1402: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
SA14kamvchtu:1408_0: taccaivaṃ nirucyate- pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt
SA14kamvchtu:1410: kalpeṣu asmin [dharme] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1414: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1416: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1419: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1422: tasyā api parikṣākṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā /
SA14kamvchtu:1424: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1427: paramārthataḥ kasyāpi saṃjñeyasyābhāvāt, na kutrāpi te saṃjñā pravartate, anyathā viparyāsaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1430: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1431: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:1432: [Vajraṭ_167] evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1435: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1438: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1439: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1442: yad dharmamātraṃ tasyāpyasattve 'aho ! na mayā bhāvyam';
SA14kamvchtu:1443: iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1446: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
SA14kamvchtu:1448: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA14kamvchtu:1449: '; śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1453: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā,
SA14kamvchtu:1454: [Vajraṭ_168] api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam /
SA14kamvchtu:1455: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām'; ityevaṃ dīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1457: asmābhiḥ sarvaiḥ paramā saṃsādhitā syāt, kathaṃ na (vayaṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:1459: anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate, tathā hi- dharmo 'yaṃ (etāvān)
SA14kamvchtu:1460: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1467: tasyāḥ ya ākāraḥ, yathā vākāraḥ, yaścākṣānteḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'nena sthānena darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1469: sarvadharmānupalambhasvabhāvaḥ, ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1476: evaṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1477: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1478: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1479: iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1481: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā iti paradehasaṃjñā, śastrasaṃjñā, chedasaṃjñā, parasaṃjñā, kṣāntisaṃjñādayaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:1483: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:1484: tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1486: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1488: vyāpādasaṃjñāpi asyāyamabhiprāyaḥ- yatra ātmasaṃjñā, tatra nūnaṃ tanmatreṇātmasneho jāyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1490: tenaivaṃ ya ātmopakāritvenopādattāsteṣvātmīyatvaṃ parikalpyate, itareṣu ca paratvaṃ kalpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1492: tatrātmani ātmīyeṣu ca pravṛttau anurāgaḥ, tadviparīteṣu ca dveṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1493: tābhyāṃ sambaddhaḥ samasto doṣarāśiḥ sambhavati / ata evoktam :
SA14kamvchtu:1495: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante // iti //

SA14kamvchtu:1498: anena kṛtāpakāre 'pi [Vajraṭ_170] sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1501: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1502: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti /

SA14kamvchtu:1510: tadapi kaliṅgarājā me aṅgapratyaṅgamāṃsānyacchetsīt ityetatprasaṅgaprāptam, sākṣānnoktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1511: sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:1519: samastenānena asahyaprahāṇāt bodhau chandena [Vajraṭ_171] praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamiti darśitam /

SA14kamvchtu:1521: bodhicittotpāde 'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1523: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1525: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ, na cātrapunaruktirapi /
SA14kamvchtu:1530: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1533: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate?
SA14kamvchtu:1534: iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:1536: atrāyamarthaḥ- anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1538: sa tasya rūpādivastuno 'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1539: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1541: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1543: te 'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1545: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ [Vajraṭ_172] ityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1546: tatra sattvaṃ saṃjñāṃ ca pratiṣidhya nairātmyadvayamudīritam /
SA14kamvchtu:1549: evaṃ tāvad yuktyā kṣāntiryujyata iti nirdiśya sāmprataṃ tathāgate sampratyayo 'pi yujyata iti nirūpayan bhūtavādī ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1552: athavā bhūtavādī iti sādhyam, tathāgataḥ iti jñāpakanirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1553: yathānye buddhā bhagavantaḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇāni prahīṇavantastathaiva tathāgato 'pyayaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ, tena tathāgataḥ /

SA14kamvchtu:1563: sa heyopādeyatattvaṃ sopāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathaiva bhāṣate 'taḥ sa kathaṃ na satyavādī syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:1564: evaṃbhūte 'pi taddeśitāni catvāri satyāni kiṃ tathaiva pratiṣṭhitānīti?

SA14kamvchtu:1569: ekasyāpi bhāvasvabhāvasya paramārthato 'siddhatvād ekamapi satyaṃ tāvad duḥsādhyam,
SA14kamvchtu:1571: evaṃ bhagavatā 'māyopamāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ'; ityukte sati kathaṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasatyasvabhāvatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:1574: nirodhasya tvabhāvāt tatprāpako mārgo 'pi naiva paramārthataḥ, gamyābhāve naiva gamako 'pi /
SA14kamvchtu:1575: tathoktam- 'bodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya ekasyāpi satyasya siddhirna dṛṣṭā, kimiti caturṇām?'; iti deśanāvat /
SA14kamvchtu:1576: etat pravicintya ye bhūtavādini śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāsteṣāmadhyāropāntaparihārārtham api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:1581: anena tāvad antadvayapratiṣedhena madhyamā pratipad eva nirdiśyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1610_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1611: sthānenānena dhyānarasāsvādāpagamāya pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ saddharmaṃ prati vīryārthaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ, (yathā)
SA14kamvchtu:1618: tatra tathāgatānubhāvastu jñātāste tathāgatena ityādi yadāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1620: bhagavān hi sarvaṃ vijānātīti sarvajñaḥ draṣṭā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:1621: tatra kiṃ mahad āścaryaṃ teṣvityanveṣaṇāyāṃ puṇyasañcayavaiśiṣṭyamādarśayitumāha sarve te sattvāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1622: aprameyapuṇyaskandhānāṃ prasavanād jñātāste bhāgyavanta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1623: kiṃ ca tāvat puṇyaskandhasya vaiśiṣṭyam, yena (saḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:1624: aparimito bhavatīti vicintya viśiṣṭapuṇyasaṃgrahaṃ darśayan paśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ! strī vā puruṣo vā ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1627: na tu viśiṣṭatvena parikalpita iveti darśayituṃ kālaśabdastatsāmānyādhikaraṇyena viśeṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1628: anyathaikātmyād ayaṃ pūrvāhṇa ityādibhedā na syuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1629: viśeṣaṇāntarairbhede 'bhyupagate sa eva viśeṣaḥ sūryādyavasthānāṃ viśeṣaḥ pūrvāhṇādivyavahāraprajñaptīnāṃ ca hetuḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:1636: sāmānyajanaiḥ saṅketavaśenotpannastathāvidhaḥ praṇināmavasthāviśeṣaḥ kālaḥ iti vyavahāre prajñapyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1637: na tu śabdārthasambandhaprajñaptivaśeneti darśayituṃ samaye iti śabdena viśeṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1641: pūrvaṃ deyasya evaṃvidhasya ca kālasyānirdeśānnaiva tāvat punaruktidoṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1642: ayameva tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyād aprameyamasaṃkhyeyam ityanena audāryaṃ paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1644: evaṃ tāvat gaṅgānadībālukāsamāna iti saṃkhyāviśeṣaṃ darśayati /
SA14kamvchtu:1647: sā ca kalpakoṭiḥ niyutā, sāpi śatasahasreti padena yuktā /
SA14kamvchtu:1648: etat kathaṃ jñātavyam? iti dharmastutivaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayitum api tu khalu subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1649: acintyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ atyantagambhīraḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nisvabhāvatālakṣaṇaḥ tathāgataiḥ pratyātmavedanīyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1653: tulyasya adhikasya vābhāvena acintyahetuto 'cintyameva phalaṃ sambhavatītyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1654: kathaṃ atulya iti cintāyāmāha śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitānām iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1657: agrayānam ityagrāṇāṃ yānaṃ vā agraṃ cedaṃ yānamiti vā padavigrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1661: paryāyadeśanābhiprāyastu vineyajanopakāraḥ, yena katipaye bhavyā bhavanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1663: samastakleśajñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhayā vā śreṣṭha athavā agramiti paramam /
SA14kamvchtu:1664: pratyekabuddhayānamapi śrāvakayānāpekṣayā paramiti vicāraṇāyāmāha- śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitānām iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1666: śrāvakādyenekayānebhyo 'tiśayena praśasyatvādatra śreṣṭhaḥ iti śabda prayuktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1671: dharmaparyāyo 'yam ityādibhiḥ yathoktārthān prasādhya upasaṃhṛtya ca tatpratipattuṃ viśeṣastutiḥ sandarśitā /
SA14kamvchtu:1672: yato hi dharmaparyāyo 'yamacintyo 'prameyaśca tasmād vipāko 'pyasyācintya eva /
SA14kamvchtu:1673: tataḥ ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti ityādi tu siddhamevetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1680: sarve te subhūte, sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti iti bodhibhārodvahanam aṃśodvahanasadṛśam /
SA14kamvchtu:1681: anena tāvat sakalena dhyānasukhāsvādaṃ parityajya jñānasambhārapāripūrihetau dharmaparigrahaṇādau chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1682: kasmāt khalu śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitebhyo bhagavatā bhāṣito na tvanyebhyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1683: kiṃ khalu bhagavatyapi rāgo dveṣaśca iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1685: anena khalu bhagavati sarvasattveṣu ekasutavad vātsalyamiti nāsti rāgo dveṣo vā /
SA14kamvchtu:1686: tathāpi ye yadā bhavyā bhavanti tadā tebhyo deśayanti, na tvanyebhyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1687: anyathā upāyānabhijñatvānnaiva bhaved bhagavān sarvajñaḥ ityevaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1690: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti nāsti tadarthamavakāśa iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1691: yacchrāvakaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiścāpi śrotuṃ na śakyate tatkathaṃ śakyate pṛthagjanaiḥ śrotum?
SA14kamvchtu:1692: yattairna śrotuṃ śakyaṃ tat kathaṃ śakyata udgrahītuṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
SA14kamvchtu:1695: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tāvadāryasubhūtinā dharmaparyāyo 'yaṃ śrotuṃ śakyata iti ced?
SA14kamvchtu:1697_0: sarvapradeśeṣu yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sūtramidaṃ bhāṣyate sa evaikaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo
SA14kamvchtu:1697_1: 'nuśaṃsanīya iti pratipādayan devadisatkāravaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayitum api tu khalu punaḥ
SA14kamvchtu:1706: nanu īdṛśeṣu dharmaparyāyeṣu abhyudyatānāmapi kathaṃ kecit paribhūtā dṛśyanta iti cintāyāṃ pāpapariśodhanaviśeṣadeśanāya ye subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:1709: suparibhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti iti vadhabandhanādibhiḥ pīḍitā bhaviṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1710: evamete mahātmānaḥ kathaṃ paribhūtā bhaviṣyantīti vicintyāha tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1714: buddhabodhiṃ [Vajraṭ_181] cānuprāpsyanti iti pāpāni pariśodhya kālāntare bhāvanāniratā na ciraṃ anuttarasamyaksabodhimabhisambuddhya buddhā bhaviṣyantīti vākyārthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1715: tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam iti yadāha tatra kena prakāreṇa aprameyākhyeyāvabodhaḥ syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:1717: atra prabhāveṇa bahutareṇa cāprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1718: tatrābhijānāmi subhūte atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ asaṃkhyeyataraiḥ ityādinā prabhāvaḥ paridīpataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1731: pūrvapuṇyaskandhaḥ uttarapuṇyaskandhasyāsya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ [Vajraṭ_182] nopaiti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1733: saṃkhyā iti tulyeṣveva yujyate, yathā himavatā (tulya) vindhya ityucyate, na tu sarṣapaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1734: kalām ityaṃśaḥ, sa ca samānajātīya eva, yathā sumeroḥ kalā parvataśikharameva, na tu tṛṇaśikharaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1735: gaṇanām ityapi tulyeṣvev, yathā sumerurapi giriḥ, himavānapi giriḥ, na tu sarṣapaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1736: upamām ityapi sadṛśeṣveva, yathā gosadṛśo gavaya ityucyute, na tu makṣikā /
SA14kamvchtu:1738: kṛtyaṃ karoti, yathā niśite kṛte sati dātramapyasikṛtyaṃ karotīti matvā upaniṣadam ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1744: api ca pariśuddhe kāle sarvasattvānāmapi pariśuddhatvānnāścaryām,
SA14kamvchtu:1745: apariśuddhe tāvat kāle ye sattvā kṣaṇamātramaśyapariśuddhā bhavanti, tadāścaryam /
SA14kamvchtu:1747: kathamasaṃkhyeyaṃ saṃkhyayeti vicāraṇāyāṃ sacetpunaḥ subhūte...... tasmin samaye ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1752: evamasnād dharmaparyāyāt saṃkhyāprabhāvapratisaṃyuktamevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ jñāyata iti?
SA14kamvchtu:1753: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1762: evaṃ nirākṛte 'pi dhyānasāsvāde pratyāsanne 'bhisamayakāleṃ yaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ ātmavaiśiṣṭyamavalokya 'ahaṃ samyaksambodhimārgapratipannaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1767: ityetad darśayituṃ pañcadaśasthāmadhikṛtyāha- sūbhūti....... avocat- kathaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1771: sa kaścid dharmo yo bodhisattvayānasamprasthito nāma ityavaśiṣṭenātra ātmagrāhavisaṃyogaḥ kriyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1773: yathedaṃ pudgaladharmanairātmyaṃ prāgeva bhagavatā prakāśitaṃ tathokte sati bodhisattveṣu punaḥ abhisamayakāle kathamātmagrāhaḥ sambhaved?
SA14kamvchtu:1775: athaivamapi deśanāyāṃ saṃmuhyet prāguktasyānavasthānaṃ ca syāditi?
SA14kamvchtu:1776: tathā deśite 'pi anādikālātyantadṛḍhībhūtātmābhiniveśavaśatayā keṣāñcit sammohasyānivṛtteḥ deśito 'pyarthaḥ punarupadiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1778: bhagavatā kṛtasyopadeśasya phalaṃ tāvat sammohavinivṛttireva vineyajanānāmiti na niṣphalam /
SA14kamvchtu:1779: ata eva sammohanirvṛtau satyāṃ phalābhāvena punaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt prakṛtamevedam /
SA14kamvchtu:1781: yadi bodhisattvayānasamprasthito nāma na syāt sa kaścid dharmaḥ (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:1782: kathaṃ bhagavān dīpaṅkarasya śāsturantikādavavādaṃ prāpya anuttarāṃ samyaksambomabhisambuddhaḥ? atha na syād (saḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:1784: abhisamayakāṅkṣiṇāvavādo na paryeṣṭavya iti ye manyante,
SA14kamvchtu:1785: teṣāmavavādaviyogavisaṃyogāya ṣoḍaśasyāmadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manse subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1787: idānīmabhisamayakāle abhisambuddhasya tasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate 'to na punaruktatā /
SA14kamvchtu:1788: nāsti paramārthataḥ sa kaścidapi jñānajñeyātmako dharmaḥ, yathā pūrvaṃ vicāritam /
SA14kamvchtu:1789: tadbalena avicāraramaṇīyamātratayā śrutamayyādiprajñopādakameṇa bhagavataḥ- [Vajraṭ_185] svayambhūsarvajñajñānaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtyā grāhyātmakaṃ samudbhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1795: kathaṃ tena samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavān vyākṛta iti vicārya sacet punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1796: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi bhagavataḥ pratyātmavedyo dharmaḥ paramārthato tathābhūto bhavart tadā syādabhisambuddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1799: ityevaṃ viparītābhiniveśāt tathāgatasya vyākaraṇaṃ na bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:1800: yato hi tadā 'mayābhisambuddhaḥ'; iti na bhavati, na ca dharmodiṣvapyabhiniveśaḥ bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1802: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo 'bhisambuddhaḥ ityanena arthato dīpaṅkarasyāntikād avavādagrāhavikalpaṃ vipakṣatvena darśayitvā tadvikalpaprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1808: yadi tathāgatena samyaksambuddhena na syāt sa kaścid dharmo yo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau abhisambuddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1812: abhisambuddha ityākhyasya kasyacid dharmasyābhāvāt tatkathaṃ bhavediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭhavān /
SA14kamvchtu:1816: sarvadharmasādhāraṇatvāt sā bhūtaḥ iti vacanena viśeṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1818: tasyāstathatāyā yā paramārthato 'nupannadharmatā sa tathāgata ityucyate / yathoktam-
SA14kamvchtu:1820: paramārthato dharmatāpi dharmiṇo netarā, ataḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpādo dharmatā /
SA14kamvchtu:1823: tasya ca paramārthato 'nutpannatvānnāsti kaścid grāhyo grāhako vā /
SA14kamvchtu:1825: tathyasaṃvṛtimāśrītya tena viśiṣṭajñānena yathā abhisambuddhaḥ tathā gata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1827: paramārthāśrayeṇābhisambuddha iti kasmāttathā nocyate? iti cintāyāṃ yaḥ kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1828: tatkasya hetoḥ? iti na satyam ityanena yogjam /
SA14kamvchtu:1831: iti vyavasthaiva kathaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicārya yaśca dharmaḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1833: tatra na satyam itiḥ māyāvatpratibhāsamānānāṃ vicāryamāṇānāmatyantaśūnyatvenānutpannatvāt śaśaśrṛṅgavad atyantābhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1835: athavā nāpi satyam, na kasyāpi dharmasya paramārthataḥ siddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1836: na mṛṣā, na ca vicāragocaraḥ kaścit satyaḥ siddhaḥ, sarvadharmāṇāmanutpādāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1837: anenādhyāropāpavādāntau nirākṛtya madhyamamārgaṃ ca vyavasthāpya yogasamāpattau pravarttyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1838: tasmāt ityevaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpādāt na satyaṃ na ca mṛṣā /
SA14kamvchtu:1839: tathāgato 'pi pariśuddhyānutpādadharmayā prabhāvitaḥ, anutpādadharmatāyāḥ sādhāraṇatvāt, (tathā hi)-
SA14kamvchtu:1847: yadyanutpannā evāmī dharmāstat kathaṃ sarvadharmāḥ ityucyanta iti pravicintya sarvadharmā iti subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1848: ayamatrārthaḥ- paramārthatastathā vidyante, na tu vyavahāraprajñaptitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1850: kintvaparamārthaṃ khalvavicāritamāśritya yasmāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt sarvadharmāḥ ityucyante,
SA14kamvchtu:1855: yadi na syāt sa kaścid dharmo bhagavatābhisambuddhaḥ kathaṃ (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:1859: kathaṃ jñānaprātyeti cet? dvividhaṃ jñānamāśritya, gotrasamparigrahajñānaṃ samatājñānañca /
SA14kamvchtu:1860: tatra yajjñānaprāptyā tathāgatagotre samutpadya buddhagotre niyato jāyate tad gotrasamparigrahajñānam /
SA14kamvchtu:1865: anena pudgaladharmanairātmyasamatājñānaṃ samavāpya abhisamayaḥ sampradarśyata ityato gotrajñānamabhidhīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1866: tena samatājñānena pudgaladharmanairātmyadhigamya sarve [Vajraṭ_189] sattvā ātmani (ātmavat)
SA14kamvchtu:1868: tasmāt samastasattvakāyānāmātmani saṅgraheṇa sa mahākāya iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1869: nāpyapārthako 'yaṃ śabdaḥ, evaṃ sarvasattvānāmātma- saṅgraheṇa sa kāya ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1872: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- bodhisattvānāmabhisamayo 'pyayaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtimāśritya viśiṣṭajñānotpādamātreṇa prabhāvito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1873: paramārthato na kiñcinnirūpakaṃ nirūpyaṃ veti darśayitum,
SA14kamvchtu:1877: upetakāyo mahākāya iti nimittamātrābhidhānena bodhiasattvānāṃ sarvadharmeṣvabhiniveśo nivartate /
SA14kamvchtu:1881: yadi tathāgatena sa eva kāyo syāt noktaḥ syāt tadā prāptābhisamayo bodhisattvaṃ 'evaṃ mayā bodhisattvābhisamayaḥ samprāptaḥ sāmpratamahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi';
SA14kamvchtu:1882: ityetat kathaṃ sañcitayetyanyadīyaṃ sadvikalpaṃ samudīkṣya nirabhimānitayābhisamayaṃ darśayituṃ yo bodhisattvaṃ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1883: anena ya evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti 'ahaṃ ya evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti';
SA14kamvchtu:1884: ahaṃ bodhiasattvo 'smi [Vajraṭ_190] ityabhimānī sa tathyato na bodhisattvaḥ iti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1886: dharmaḥ iti tu rupādiasvabhāvo vā pudgalādisvabhāvo va /
SA14kamvchtu:1887: yuktito vicāraṇāyāṃ tasya dharmasyādṛsṭatvād āryasubhūtirapyāha no hīdam iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1888: tasyā yukteḥ sarvatra sādhāraṇatvād bhagavān nairātmyadvayāvatāraṇārthaṃ tasmād ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1889: nisattvāḥ ityādi tāvadupalakṣaṇam, niḥsvabhāvā api draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1892: tadapi buddhasya saptabhiḥ sampadbhiḥ saṃgṛhyate / sapta sampadaśca-
SA14kamvchtu:1901: tatra yadi na syāt kaścid bodhisattvo nāma dharmaḥ, (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:1903: ityāśaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhisampadamadhikṛtya- yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1904: so 'pi tathaiva vaktavyaḥ ityabhimānitvānnocyate sa bodhisattva ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1909: anena kṣetravyūheṣu māyopamatvādhimuktyā bodhisattvena kathaṃ sthātavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1911: bhagavatā kathamuktā iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1914: pūrvaṃ tāvadadhimukticaryābhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvakṣetrapariśuddhau praṇidhānāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvavikalpasya niṣedhārtham (uktāḥ)

SA14kamvchtu:2493: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho 'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2496: ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato 'grāhya eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2501: kimucyata iti cet? vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe 'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān /
SA14kamvchtu:2502: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha- sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhītaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2504: tadāśayavaśena vyavahāraḥ prajñapyate, (ato) na virodha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2505: tasmāt te bālā ityucyante, anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2508: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2510: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2511: evamanusandhiḥ- yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2519: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2522: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2523: tāmātmadṛṣṭiṃ yadi satyato na gṛhṇāti (tadā) evaṃ prayoge bodhisattvo yogasamāpattau pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:2525: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo 'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2527: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2528: kenāvikalpyamitiṃ cet? jñānena darśanena adhimuktyā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:2536: tathā cādhimoktavyā, yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo 'vikalpastaṃ darśayati /
SA14kamvchtu:2537: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2538: kasyacit saṃjñeyasya abhāvo 'pi, ekānekasvabhāvaśūnyatvāt paramārthata sā asaṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:2540: tasyā [Vajraṭ_223] mithyārthādhigamāvasthāyāṃ kathaṃ na syādavikalpa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2544: tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2545: kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2546: iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanāsaṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2554: anena yamānmahārtho 'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2555: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2558: evamuktam- yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito 'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ [Vajraṭ_224] tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2561: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2563: anena yogasamāpattiḥ, cittapragrahaḥ gāmbhīryañca nirdiṣṭam, pūrveṇa tāvadaudāryam /
SA14kamvchtu:2565: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2569: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2570: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2573: tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
SA14kamvchtu:2577: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:2581: avaśyāyopamayā anityatānvayaḥ pradarśyate, na ciraṃ sthitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2584: yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2585: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā /
SA14kamvchtu:2603: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
SA14kamvchtu:2606: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2608: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2609: ato 'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2612: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2613: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:2621: niravadhijagaddhitasukhasādhanābhiprāyeṇa saṃsāracakrasaṃsaraṇaṃ yāvat pratiṣṭhito veditavyaḥ / tathā coktam-
SA14kamvchtu:2622: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2624: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat /
SA14kamvchtu:2625: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt //
SA14kamvchtu:2626: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā /
SA14kamvchtu:2627: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā /
SA14kamvchtu:2628: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti /
